page.title: 19VILLAGE LIFE (STOKE BRUERNE)
page.content: A COLLECTION OF OPINIONS ABOUT LIFE IN STOKE AND SHUTLANGER.(BY THE CHILDREN OF THE VILLAGES.) "LIVING IN SHUTLANGER IS NICE BECAUSE IS HAS LOTS OF WILDLIFE AND FIELDS TO PLAY IN." "I LIKE THE OLD COTTAGES." "I WOULDN'T LIKE CINEMAS AND OTHER AMUSEMENTS,THEY WOULD SPOIL STOKE." "I LIKE STOKE BECAUSE IT'S QUIETER THAN TOWN BUT AT WEEKENDS IT IS CROWDED AND I HATE TOURISTS BECAUSE THEY DROP LITTER" "THE WORST TIME IN SHUTLANGER IS WHEN THERE IS A BIG RACE AT SILVERSTONE.CARS QUEUE IN OUR VILLAGE AND SOME PEOPLE ASK IF THEY CAN BORROW YOUR BIKE TO GET THROUGH THE TRAFFIC!" "IN SHUTLANGER WE CAN PLAY ON THE ROAD AS THERE IS NO TRAFFIC." "THE WORST THINGS ARE THE POOR BUS SERVICE AND HAVING TO GO A LONG WAY FOR SHOPPING." (EDITED BY D.K.ANDREW)
